hero.heading: Live
hero.subheading: Welcome to Dalice. Here, I believe in the art of living beautifully. Each piece is meticulously handcraftedâ€”from my original paintings that set the mood of a room, to my fine jewelry that tells a personal story, and my sculptural lighting and tabletop art that transform a house into a home. My creations are made not just to be admired, but to be an intimate part of your life, bringing a touch of curated beauty to your everyday.

Home.quote: The paintings are original creations inspired by the beauty of nature and the poetry of Monica and Ion Pillat.
